name: rails_enterprise
description: Installs Ruby on Rails with Ruby Enterprise Edition
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Installs Ruby on Rails under Ruby Enterprise Edition

= REQUIREMENTS:

ruby_enterprise

= ATTRIBUTES:

* rails_enterprise[:version] - Install the specified version. Default false (installs latest).
* rails_enterprise[:environment] - Set Rails environment. Default production.

rails_enterprise/version.description: Specify the version of Rails to install

rails_enterprise/environment.description: Specify the environment to use for Rails

rails_enterprise/max_pool_size.description: Specify the MaxPoolSize in the Apache vhost

recipes.rails_enterprise: Installs Ruby on Rails with Ruby Enterprise Edition
